definitions.text: a piece of information about circumstances that exist or events that have occurred
examples: first you must collect all the facts of the case

definitions.text: a statement or assertion of verified information about something that is the case or has happened
examples: he supported his argument with an impressive array of facts

definitions.text: an event known to have happened or something known to have existed
examples: your fears have no basis in fact
how much of the story is fact and how much fiction is hard to tell

definitions.text: a concept whose truth can be proved
